comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: At the trivial level, the negative number etched here is 2680-2. You will notice that Alben Barkley is sitting at the same desk upon which sits the same telephone as that used by Miss Genevieve Clark, adjacent in this photostream, and which also has the consecutive negative number 2680-3: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3295498512/

comment.author: 15362885@N00
comment._content: He coined "veep" as a nickname for "vice president."
